==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Wet Application
|desc_1 = When attacked, the Hydro Slime applies the {{Color|Wet}} Status for 10 seconds to all players and enemies in a '''2m''' radius.

|name_2 = Ram
|file_2 = Large Hydro Slime Bump
|desc_2 = Rams into the player, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.

|name_3 = Jumping Slam
|file_3 = Large Hydro Slime Leap
|desc_3 = Jumps high into the air before slamming down at the player's location, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}.
* Certain enhanced Large Hydro Slimes, found in certain [[Domains]], [[Spiral Abyss]], overworld events and challenges, have reduced [[Cooldown]] on this attack.

|name_4 = Bubble Spit
|desc_4 = Launches a [[Bubbles|Gurgling Bubble]] in a high arc at the target.
* Upon contact with a player, the bubble deals '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}}, temporarily trapping and immobilizing the player.
* Upon contact with another enemy, temporarily traps and immobilizes the enemy, or simply pops if the enemy is too large to be trapped.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A monster created by the sedimentation of Hydro dispersed throughout nature.<br>A larger and more powerful Hydro Slime that can create bubbles to entrap its enemies. It is said that they can grow to truly staggering sizes if given an energy-rich environment. Eyewitnesses have supposedly seen Hydro Slimes as large as a small mound in Wolvendom.|[[Archive]]}}
